    • create

      public boolean create​(com.gradview.data.dam.AccProgramDAM input) throws org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException, Exception
      Inserts the program into the "`acc-program`" table.
      Parameters:
      input - The program to insert into the "`acc-program`" table.
      Returns:
      boolean Status of creation. True: program was added to the "`acc-program`" table. False: program was NOT added to the "`acc-program`" table.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException - An access exception occured.
      Exception - Catch all for any exception.

    • update

      public boolean update​(com.gradview.data.dam.AccProgramDAM input) throws org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException, Exception
      Updates the program into the "`acc-program`" table using the AccProgramDAM's ID to select the database entry to update.
      Parameters:
      input - The program to update into the "`acc-program`" table.
      Returns:
      boolean Status of update. True: program was updated in the "`acc-program`" table. False: program was NOT updated in the "`acc-program`" table.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException - An access exception occured.
      Exception - Catch all for any exception.

    • delete

      public boolean delete​(com.gradview.data.dam.AccProgramDAM input) throws org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException
      Delets the inputed program from the "`acc-program`" table using both of AccProgramDAM's ID to select the database entry to delete.
      Parameters:
      input - The AccProgramDAM to delete into the "`acc-program`" table.
      Returns:
      boolean Status of deletion. True: program was deleted from the "`acc-program`" table. False: program was NOT deleted from the "`acc-program`" table.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException - An access exception occured.
      Exception - Catch all for any exception.
